description:

description:
I'm thrilled to announce that my first bookâ€”The 5 Types of Wealthâ€”is officially â€‹available for preorderâ€‹ everywhere books are sold! Order today: https://www.the5typesofwealth.com

Leave a comment on this video and I'll personally reply with my thanks and a few ideas I think you'll enjoy in the book. No automations, just me, because real impact is personal and human.

I believe this book is going to change millions of lives. Its ideas have already changed mine...

So, what is â€‹The 5 Types of Wealthâ€‹ all about?

It's about rejecting the default and living life by design.

It's about realizing that your wealthy life may involve money, but in the end, it will be defined by everything else.

In this book, I offer a new way for you to think about your life centered around five types of wealth:

â€¢ Time Wealth
â€¢ Social Wealth
â€¢ Mental Wealth
â€¢ Physical Wealth
â€¢ Financial Wealth

A new way to measure what matters, make better decisions, and design your life around the pillars that truly create lasting joy and fulfillment.

Importantly, this book will not give you the answers. It will give you the right questions, so that you can uncover and act on them.

While the lens through which you view them will be individual, the stories, questions, ideas, and tools contained in this book are universal.

No matter who you are, or where you are on your journey, this book is for you.

If youâ€™ve enjoyed any of my work, youâ€™re going to find immense value in this book. I guarantee it.

My humble ask: Preorders are extremely important for the success of a bookâ€”retailers use the data to determine buys, placement, and moreâ€”so I'd be truly grateful for your support as I continue on my mission to create millions of positive ripples in the world.

Order your copy today: https://www.the5typesofwealth.com

â€”

description:
I'm sharing seven life-changing questions that have reshaped my understanding of myself and the world around me.

Over the last decade, I've collected questions that cut through the noise and challenge the status quo. These are the ones that persist, the queries that disrupt routine thinking and invite profound introspection.

You'll see how the art of questioning can unveil new perspectives, scrub away self-limiting beliefs, and shatter the assumptions that have held you back.

Whether you're looking to recalibrate your priorities or ignite a deeper change, these questions are your starting point.
